description.p: This addon allows integration between MS Outlook and Nuxeo.

Compile and install the Outlook Addon located at https://github.com/astone-solutions/NuxeoOutlookAddin/tree/master/PluginVSTO Configure the remote Nuxeo instance through the Nuxeo>Configuration menu on MS Outlook

Select one or several emails in Outlook, right-click and select "Send to Nuxeo" menu.
Select the destination target on Nuxeo and confirm
Connect on Nuxeo to see the email object(s)
